ComicInfo.Title: Untold Tales, Part 5
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Untold Tales” Part 5! Bespectacled, beautiful, brilliant, and bombastic! BEWARE! The Baroness bewitches in the final untold tale from Living Legend Larry Hama, alongside hard-charger and fan-favorite G.I. Joe: ARAH alum, artist Ron Joseph!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ron Joseph (a) & Adam Guzowski (c) | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Kieran McKeown (a) & Adam Guzowski (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | John Royle (a), Jagdish Kumar (a) & James Offredi (c) | 4 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Snake Eyes Classic Trade Dress) | Kirill Repin | 5 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Snake Eyes Recolored Virgin) | Kirill Repin | 6 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Snake Eyes Daytime Virgin) | Kirill Repin | 7 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:16:31. [CVDB846012]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Shearer, Ron Joseph, Brian Shearer, Ron Joseph
ComicInfo.Inker: Brian Shearer, Ron Joseph, Brian Shearer, Ron Joseph
ComicInfo.Colorist: J. Brown, Adam Guzowski, James Brown (J. Brown)
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Guzowski, Jagdish Kumar, James Offredi, John Royle, Kieran McKeown, Kirill Repin, Ron Joseph
